page.heroSubtitle: Become a Love Young Partner and receive 2000 LY Points. Through sales and 10-tier referral network, LY Points are continuously replenished, and earnings never stop.
page.applicationSubmittedDesc: Complete payment to activate your partner status.

concepts.assetTransparencyDesc: Every digital operating right is anchored to real bird's nest raw materials, premium health products inventory and other physical assets.
concepts.earningsGuaranteeDesc: Earnings are secured through the LY Points system with transparent data and efficient settlement.
concepts.globalFlowDesc: Break geographical limitations and participate in the global premium wellness industry chain layout and dividends.

dividends.title: Dual Earnings Model
dividends.subtitle: Two dividend methods operate simultaneously, earnings stack. Withdrawal deducts LY Points 1:1, continuously replenished through 10-tier network.
dividends.cashbackDesc: Earn instant cashback from direct partner sales plus same-level rewards from your upline network
dividends.rwaDesc: 30% of platform sales go into bonus pool, distributed every 10 days by RWA token ratio
dividends.cashbackExample: Example: Customer buys 1 box (RM199), direct partner gets RM99.5 cashback (50%), their referrer gets RM9.95 (10% same-level reward)
dividends.rwaExample: Example: You sell 20 boxes in a cycle, holding 21 tokens. If total tokens are 550 and bonus pool is RM29,850, you get RM1,140 dividend

ly.title: LY Points: The Perpetual Earnings Engine
ly.subtitle: Withdrawal requires equal LY Points deduction, but continuously replenished through 10-tier referral network. As long as the network is active, earnings never stop!
ly.totalReplenish: Total Replenishment: 10-tier network can replenish up to
ly.neverDry: LY never runs dry, earnings never stop!
ly.whyMoreDesc: Invest RM1000 to get 2000 LY, seemingly max withdrawal RM2000. But every sale in your 10-tier network replenishes LY Points proportionally. The more active your network, the faster LY replenishes, naturally more earnings to withdraw!
ly.importantNoteDesc: Cannot withdraw corresponding earnings when LY Points are insufficient. Continue operating to replenish LY and ensure earnings are withdrawable.

tierSection.title: Choose Your Partner Level
tierSection.subtitle: Higher investment, more LY Points, higher withdrawal limit

simulator.title: RWA Dividend Simulator
simulator.subtitle: Adjust parameters to estimate your cycle dividend earnings

ecosystem.title: LOVEYOUNG Brand Ecosystem
ecosystem.desc1: LOVEYOUNG has built a complete brand ecosystem covering premium products, KOL collaborations, RWA investments, community building, digital marketing and more.
ecosystem.desc2: As a partner, you become an important part of this ecosystem, jointly driving brand development and sharing growth dividends.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Answering Your Concerns
faqs.q1: What is a Partner? How is it different from traditional agents?
faqs.a1: Partners are brand co-builders, not traditional tiered agents. We have no inventory requirements, all earnings come from real end-product sales. Every box you share ships directly from the factory, ensuring quality and freshness.
faqs.q2: Can investing RM1000 really earn more than RM2000?
faqs.a2: Yes! Invest RM1000 to become a Launch Partner and receive 2000 LY Points. This means you can withdraw minimum RM2000 (1:1 LY deduction). But earnings go far beyond 2x—through your 10-tier referral network, every sale replenishes your LY Points proportionally, continuously unlocking more earnings!
faqs.q3: What's the difference between cashback dividends and RWA pool dividends?
faqs.a3: Cashback dividends are instant cashback: direct partner sales earn 50% (first 5 boxes) or 30% (after), plus a 10% same-level reward from your upline partner's sales. RWA pool dividends are periodic dividends every 10 days—the platform puts 30% of sales into the bonus pool, distributed by your RWA token ratio. Both require equal LY Points for withdrawal.
faqs.q4: What are LY Points? How to replenish?
faqs.a4: LY Points are your earnings security deposit. Every sale in your 10-tier referral network replenishes LY Points by tier percentage (Layer 1: 20%, Layer 2: 15%, Layers 3-5: 10%, Layers 6-10: 5%). As long as your network stays active, LY Points flow continuously, and earnings naturally keep coming!
faqs.q5: Why does withdrawal require LY Points deduction?
faqs.a5: The LY mechanism ensures earnings sustainability. This design encourages partners to build stable sales networks, unlocking more earnings through continuous action rather than one-time cashout. Keep taking action, and your earnings will far exceed your initial investment!
faqs.q6: Do I need to stock inventory?
faqs.a6: Absolutely not! All products ship directly from factory to end customers. You just focus on sharing and promoting. Zero inventory, zero risk!

cta.subtitle: Invest RM1,000, get 2,000 LY Points. Continuously replenished through 10-tier network, earnings go beyond 2x,

order1.q: How do I place an order?
order1.a: Select products on the product page and click "Buy Now" to contact our WhatsApp customer service to complete your order.

order2.q: How can I check my order status?
order2.a: Log in and go to the Member Center, where you can view all order statuses and shipping information in "My Orders".

shipping1.q: What areas do you deliver to?
shipping1.a: We currently deliver throughout Malaysia, including East and West Malaysia. For Singapore and other international deliveries, please contact customer service.

shipping2.a: West Malaysia typically takes 3-5 business days, East Malaysia 5-7 business days. Delays may occur during holidays.

payment1.a: We support FPX online banking, Touch n Go e-wallet, credit/debit cards, and other payment methods.

payment2.a: Yes, all payments are processed through encrypted channels, and your payment information is strictly protected.

refund1.q: Can I return or exchange items?
refund1.a: Due to the nature of food products, returns are not generally accepted. For quality issues, please contact customer service within 24 hours of receiving your order.

refund2.q: How long does a refund take?
refund2.a: After verification, refunds will be returned to your payment account within 3-7 business days.

points1.a: Earn points by purchasing products, referring new users, and participating in promotional activities.

points2.q: What can I use points for?
points2.a: Points can be used to redeem coupons, offset order amounts, or exchange for exclusive gifts.

partner1.q: How do I become a partner?
partner1.a: Click the "Join Now" button on the Partner page, select a package, and complete the payment to apply.

partner2.a: Partners enjoy LY point rewards, RWA token dividends, referral commissions, and 10-level network earnings.

brand.title: Brand Story
brand.subtitle: Sailing Against the Wind, Born for Love
brand.qualityDesc: Carefully selected premium ingredients, crafted with care
brand.freshDesc: Daily fresh cooking, cold chain delivery, locking in nutrition
brand.careDesc: Professional consultant team, caring service for every customer
brand.whatsappMessage: Hello, I would like to learn more about LOVEYOUNG brand.

hero.title: Sailing Against The Wind
hero.description: LOVEYOUNG Fresh Stew, a premium nourishing brand from Malaysia. We believe every woman deserves to be treated with tenderness, awakening elegant strength from within with the purest nourishment.

foundersSection.title: Sailing Against The Wind · Founders' Story
foundersSection.subtitle: Three life paths, one direction — health shouldn't just be a remedy when problems arise, but a gentle daily commitment
foundersSection.summaryText: They've all walked through challenges, faced reality, and made choices at different stages of life. In the end, they united under the same philosophy — this is the true spirit of 'Sailing Against The Wind'.

vivian.subtitle: The one who started with a bowl of fish maw and bird's nest
vivian.motto: Staying true to our mission — making 'good things' the best they can be
vivian.story: Vivian was the first to embark on this journey. From sharing on social media, she gradually brought fish maw and bird's nest into larger communities, postpartum centers, beauty salons, and into countless women's daily lives.
vivian.insight: She wasn't in a hurry to scale up. Instead, she spent most of her time on the product itself — testing taste, researching formulas, adjusting sweetness and consistency — all to find the perfect balance of delicious and truly nourishing.
vivian.belief: Quality is the steadiest ship in the storm.

agnes.subtitle: After seeing too many stories, she chose to protect health
agnes.motto: She believes true wealth is never about numbers
agnes.story: Agnes was a strong woman in the insurance industry. Years of career experience showed her countless highs and lows — some achieved brilliant careers but lost their health; some had abundant wealth but neglected themselves and their families.
agnes.insight: These real stories from clients made her gradually understand: physical and mental health is the foundation of all protection. She hopes to transform her years of understanding about 'risk, protection, and long-term value' into a more life-embracing companionship.
agnes.belief: Helping those around us take care of themselves, even in the midst of busy and stressful lives.

andrey.subtitle: Under the spotlight, she understands true wellness
andrey.motto: Beauty shouldn't come from anxiety, but from a state of being
andrey.story: Andrey became a professional car model in her teens, later developing into a KOL in social media. Active at galas, parties, fashion and social events, she's seen too many definitions of 'beauty' — quick, superficial, consumed.
andrey.insight: But she's become increasingly clear: what truly keeps people youthful and charming isn't external additions, but stable mindset, healthy eating, and a light body. For her, fish maw and bird's nest isn't a 'supplement', but a daily choice that brings the body back to balance and makes life more graceful.
andrey.belief: The best self-care is not forcing yourself.

origin.title: Our Beginning
origin.p1: In 2020, three like-minded women met in Kuala Lumpur. They shared a common experience — neglecting their own health in busy lives until their bodies sent warning signals, making them realize the importance of nourishing wellness.
origin.p2: However, truly high-quality, preservative-free fresh-stewed fish maw and bird's nest products were rare in the market. This is the healthiest way to nourish, yet very time-consuming to prepare. Urban women often busy caring for family and work simply couldn't make a proper bowl for themselves.
origin.p3: So they decided to create their own brand, using the strictest standards and most sincere intentions to provide the purest and most convenient nourishment for every busy woman.
origin.p4: This is the birth of LOVEYOUNG — love yourself first, then love the world better.

production.title: Craftsmanship & Quality
production.p1: From personally sourcing bird's nest and fish maw at their origins to rigorous screening of every batch, we only select quality ingredients that meet our standards for production.
production.p2: All products are cooked and packaged at LoveYoung's own sterile production facility, using low-temperature slow-stewing techniques to preserve the ingredients' nutrition and taste layers while ensuring hygiene and safety.
production.p3: Every bottle of fresh-stewed product undergoes multiple quality inspections and is delivered through full cold-chain logistics, ensuring what reaches you is always fresh, safe, and trustworthy quality.

valuesSection.subtitle: We believe true beauty comes from health, true strength comes from within. LOVEYOUNG is not just a brand, but a way of life.

love.title: Love at Core
love.description: Every product carries deep care for women's health, from ingredients to formula, protecting every customer with heart.

natural.title: Natural & Pure
natural.description: Carefully selecting bird's nest and fish maw from the world's finest regions, rejecting additives, preserving nature's most precious gifts.

quality.title: Quality Assured
quality.description: Full cold-chain delivery, individual packaging, every batch passes strict quality inspection, ensuring freshness and safety.

global.title: Global Vision
global.description: Integrating Southeast Asia's top bird's nest resources, introducing international quality management systems, creating a world-class nourishing brand.

lifestyle.title: Elegant Lifestyle
lifestyle.subtitle: LOVEYOUNG advocates not just products, but an elegant lifestyle from within

wellness.title: Health & Wellness
wellness.description: A bottle of fresh-stewed bird's nest daily, starting your day full of vitality

community.title: Community Connection
community.description: Share wellness insights with like-minded sisters

events.title: Brand Events
events.description: Join exclusive salons, experience elegant circles

philosophy.title: Sailing Against The Wind · Women's Power
philosophy.p1: 'Sailing Against The Wind' is not just our brand spirit, but a tribute to every modern woman. In life's storms, we believe every woman has the courage to ride the waves.
philosophy.p2: LOVEYOUNG is committed to being a solid support for women's growth journey. Whether you're a career elite, stay-at-home mom, or entrepreneur, we hope to recharge your energy with the finest nourishing products, helping you move forward gracefully even in adversity.

milestonesSection.title: Brand Journey & Future Blueprint
milestonesSection.subtitle: From founding to soaring, our story has just begun

milestones.2020: Brand founded in Kuala Lumpur, focusing on premium fresh-stewed bird's nest
milestones.2022: Established our own swiftlet house base in Malaysia, achieving raw material self-control
milestones.2024: Innovative product line upgrade, launched new flavor series, well-received by market
milestones.2025: Brand officially renamed to LOVEYOUNG, opening a new brand era
milestones.2026: Launched 'Sailing Against The Wind' program, introduced RWA partner system
milestones.2027: Plan to enter Singapore and Hong Kong markets, establish regional distribution network
milestones.2028: Goal to launch probiotics, collagen and other new categories, completing health ecosystem
milestones.2030: Vision to become Southeast Asia's leading women's health nourishing brand

partnerStories.title: Partner Stories
partnerStories.p1: Every LOVEYOUNG partner has their own amazing story. They come from different backgrounds — some are stay-at-home moms, some are office professionals, some are seasoned entrepreneurs. But they all have one thing in common: they chose LOVEYOUNG, they chose to sail against the wind.
partnerStories.p2: We're preparing a partner story blog column, where we'll share these beautiful women's entrepreneurial journeys, growth insights, and success experiences. Stay tuned!

futureVision.title: Future Vision
futureVision.p1: LOVEYOUNG's goal is not only to become Southeast Asia's leading women's health nourishing brand, but also to build a complete women's health ecosystem.
futureVision.p2: From bird's nest and fish maw to probiotics and collagen, we will continuously enrich our product line to meet women's comprehensive health needs. Through the RWA partner program, we help more women achieve both wealth and health.

communityWellness.title: Community Events · Healthy Living
communityWellness.subtitle: LOVEYOUNG is not just a brand, but a community that empowers women's growth

impact.title: Community Impact
impact.description: Empowering Malaysian women, creating positive social impact through LOVEYOUNG Academy and charitable activities.

wellnessLife.title: Wellness Lifestyle
wellnessLife.description: From meditation to yoga, from workplace to social life, LOVEYOUNG accompanies modern women in every life scenario.

brandEvents.title: Brand Event Experience
brandEvents.description: From reception to tours, from exchanges to parties, creating unique origin journey experiences for partners.

cta.title: Begin Your Elegant Wellness Journey
cta.description: Every LOVEYOUNG product is our commitment to quality, our persistence in health, our pursuit of beauty.

landing.heroDesc: From Young Love (nourishing others) to Love Young (loving yourself first).
landing.heroDescSub: This isn't just a brand reversal, but an awakening of every woman's soul.
landing.whatsappMessage: Hello, I am interested in LOVEYOUNG Bird's Nest and Fish Maw products. I would like to learn more.
landing.brandQuote: If you don't take yourself seriously, the world won't either.
landing.brandP1: Love Young was founded by three young women who healed and grew stronger after emotional trauma. We've been at rock bottom, asked to give endlessly, forgetting how to love ourselves.
landing.brandP2: "Young Love" was a beautiful accident in our design, meaning nourishing others. But we decided to reverse it to "Love Young" — loving that young, authentic self first.
landing.brandP3: What we offer isn't just a RM488 gift box, but a commitment to yourself about being "fresh, special, exquisite, and precious."
landing.productsSubtitle: 6-jar luxury gift box, 12 flavors customized batch fresh stew, cold chain delivery.
landing.product1Desc: Innovative multi-layer rotating structure, Eastern charm of vermillion and ink green. Contains 6 jars of high-concentration fresh-stewed fish maw and bird's nest.
landing.product2Desc: Classic square design, gold thread and ink green intertwined, craftsmanship details. Contains 6 jars of high-concentration fresh-stewed fish maw and bird's nest.
landing.product3Desc: New Year limited edition, fresh jade-like color scheme. Contains 6 jars of high-concentration fresh-stewed fish maw and bird's nest.
landing.rwaSubtitle: Digital Asset Co-creation, Brand Value Sharing
landing.rwaDesc: Empowered by blockchain technology, every woman can participate in brand building and share in growth dividends.
landing.rwaFeature2Desc: Member referral growth, co-building brand community
landing.rwaFeature3Desc: Brand grows, digital assets appreciate together
landing.rwaFeature4Desc: Direct referral rewards + repurchase rebates + bonus pool
landing.ctaDesc: Whether for yourself or your loved ones, Love Young brings you the purest nourishment experience.
landing.productCard1Name: Blooming Rotation · Round Premium Gift Box
landing.productCard1Desc: Innovative multi-layer rotating structure with oriental charm. Contains 6 jars of high-concentration fresh-stewed fish maw and bird's nest.
landing.productCard2Name: Against The Wind · Classic Custom Series
landing.productCard2Desc: 12 customizable flavors. Natural ingredients like ginseng, red dates, and goji berries. Zero additives for peace of mind.
landing.productCard3Desc: Limited designs for CNY/Mid-Autumn/Dragon Boat festivals. Premium gifting choice with festive elements.
landing.partnerSectionSubtitle: Breaking traditional agency models. We don't seek investors, only brand co-builders.
landing.phase1Desc: Receive 2,000 LY energy points, first box product gift, and brand co-building benefits.
landing.phase2Desc: Higher dividend weight and social celebrity event tickets.
landing.phase3Desc: For mature entrepreneurs. Brand co-branding and deep business collaboration.
landing.revenueLogicDesc: Love Young rejects pyramid schemes. Every cent of income comes from real product sales. We use LY (Energy) to record your contribution.
landing.lyNetworkNote: * LY energy points unlock cash dividends, automatically replenished through referral network sales.
landing.dashboardDesc: Visualize your energy points, RWA weight, and 10-level network. Every number witnesses your growth.
landing.ctaSectionDesc: Whether for yourself or your loved ones, Love Young brings you the purest nourishment experience.

productsPage.whatsappMessage: Hello, I would like to order LOVEYOUNG products.

hero.title: Premium Selection · Quality Nourishment
hero.description: Every product reflects our relentless pursuit of quality. From Indonesian golden swiftlet nests to deep-sea fish maw, we only select the finest ingredients to bring you the purest nourishment.

coldChain.title: Cold Chain Delivery
coldChain.description: Full cold chain, fresh to your door

quality.title: Origin Traceability · Craftsmanship
quality.description: Our bird's nest comes from Indonesia's finest swiftlet houses, each nest carefully selected. Fish maw is sourced from deep-sea wild fish, rich in natural collagen.

traceability.title: Ingredient Traceability
traceability.description: Every batch traceable to origin, ensuring safe and reliable sources

craftsmanship.title: Traditional Craftsmanship
craftsmanship.description: Traditional slow-stewing techniques preserve complete nutritional content

inspection.title: Strict Quality Control
inspection.description: Every batch passes microbial, heavy metal and multiple tests

cta.title: Begin Your Nourishing Journey
cta.description: Whether for personal wellness or gifting loved ones, LOVEYOUNG is your elegant choice.
